sentences.sentence: But during the summer, maiko will wear black lacquered Okobo.
sentences.translation: 不过夏天时，舞妓会穿着上了黑漆的高跟木屐。

sentences.sentence: Chopsticks can be made of lacquered wood and covered with artwork.
sentences.translation: 筷子能用漆木制成并饰以艺术作品。

sentences.sentence: Here in the kids bath, my husband made simple shelving which I lacquered gray.
sentences.translation: 孩子们在这里洗澡。简单的架子是我丈夫做的，我把它涂成了灰色。
